messages.subject: who should pay.
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 10/7/02 6:45:39 PM Central Daylight Time, Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 10/7/02 6:45:39 PM Central Daylight Time,
Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:

<< Ask him what happens to the schooled kids who don't get a certain score.
Do
they then have to be homeschooled? >>

Now that would be fair, wouldn't it?
It always bugs the heck out of me that homeschoolers are under such scrutiny
and supposedly made to keep to a certain "standard" while the public schools
are harming and not educating masses of people but not forced to quit what
they're doing.
Turn about's fair play....

Ren
